node.title: Connor Whitehead investigation: Man charged with murder
node.description: A 32-year-old man has been charged with murder following the death of the Christchurch teenager.
node.content:
["A 32-year-old man has been charged with murder following the death of Christchurch teenager Connor Whitehead.", "", "
Connor Whitehead who was fatally shot in Christchurch on 5 November 2021. Photo: Give a Little
", "The 16-year-old was shot at a party in the suburb of Casebrook on Friday night.", "The man was taken into custody at a Burnside residential address on Sunday.", "He was charged with murder late on Monday and is due to appear in Christchurch District Court today."]
